citation.biblCit: Paszkowski, Patrick, 2016, "Video 6", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/10875, UAL Dataverse, V1

stdyInfo.abstract: GFPcro BSC-40 cells were transfected with linearized pmCherry-cro plasmid 4 hours prior to infecting with VACV-pE/L-mCherry(t) at MOI = 5. Images were collected immediately after initiating the infection and the appearance of new GFPcro labeled DNA was used to track factory development, while mCherry fluorescence was used to detect plasmid-by-virus recombination. Images were collected every 5 minutes up to 10 h post infection.

Images were collected immediately after initiating the infection and the appearance of new GFPcro labeled DNA was used to track factory development, while mCherry fluorescence was used to detect plasmid-by-virus recombination.
